section.p: The sky turns black and spits lightning. Your crew grow fearful. ‘Lay her a-hold!’ cries the bosun in panic. ‘Bestir yourselves, lads, or we’re done for!’

p.if: If you have the blessing of Alvir and Valmir, which confers Safety from Storms, you can ignore the storm. Cross off your blessing and .

section.p:
Otherwise the storm hits with titanic fury, throwing vast fists of water up from the sea to batter your ship’s frail timbers.
